#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int a[100000001], s=0, d[1000001], urm=1;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long n;
    a[1]=1;
    s=1;
    urm = 2;
    for (long i = 2; i<=100000000; i++)
    {
        a[i] = s;
        if (i == urm *urm)
        {
            urm++;
            s++;
            a[i]=s;
        }
    }


    cin >> t;
    for (int i = 1;  i<=t; i++)
    {
        cin >> n;
        d[i] = a[n];
    }
    for (int  i =1; i<=t; i++)cout  << d[i] << '\n';
    return 0;
}
